meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lani Gonzalez Katie Landers Doug Hartman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7385.

td.p: Lani Gonzalez, a managing director of an art bazaar from Austin, Texas
Katie Landers, a copywriter from Los Angeles, California
Doug Hartman, a consulting engineer from Virginia Beach, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,400)

tr.td: MUSICIANS' SIGNATURE MOMENTS
HISTORIC OOPSIES
THE U.N.'s COUNTRY ABBREVIATION
HODGEPODGE
A BLANK EXPRESSION
(Alex: And finally, in a tribute to the trusted bartender's guide since the 1930s...)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On Jan. 30, 1969 this band played for 42 minutes on the roof of a Savile Row building')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: On Jan. 30, 1969 this band played for 42 minutes on the roof of a Savile Row building

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '[Katie gave both listed responses without saying "What is..."]

the nuclear bomb (the atomic bomb)

Katie
')
